mapper.sql: unit_id, unit_name, principal_id, principal_name, unit_address, unit_tel, supervision_id, overall_picture_id, facilitiy_num
mapper.select:
select * from key_unit
unit_id = #{unitId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
and unit_name like '%${unitName}%'
and principal_name like '%${principalName}%'
mapper.insert:
insert into key_unit
unit_id,
unit_name,
principal_id,
principal_name,
unit_address,
unit_tel,
supervision_id,
overall_picture_id,
facilitiy_num,
#{unitId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{unitName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{principalId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{principalName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{unitAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

#{supervisionId,jdbcType=INTEGER},

mapper.update:
update key_unit
unit_name = #{unitName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
principal_id = #{principalId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
principal_name = #{principalName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
unit_address = #{unitAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
unit_tel = #{unitTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
supervision_id = #{supervisionId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
overall_picture_id = #{overallPictureId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
facilitiy_num = #{facilitiyNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where unit_id = #{unitId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update key_unit set unit_name = #{unitName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, principal_id = #{principalId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, principal_name = #{principalName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, unit_address = #{unitAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, unit_tel = #{unitTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, supervision_id = #{supervisionId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, overall_picture_id = #{overallPictureId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, facilitiy_num = #{facilitiyNum,jdbcType=INTEGER} where unit_id = #{unitId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
